title: Reduce water pollution until MB equals MC

content.question: A chemical plant pollutes a river that serves as the water supply for a nearby town. From an economist's point of view, pollution from the plant should be reduced until the

choices.label: marginal benefit from the cleaner water is equal to the marginal cost of making the water cleaner
marginal benefit from cleaner water is maximized
total benefit from cleaner water is zero
total benefit from cleaner water is equal to the total cost of making the water cleaner
total benefit from cleaner water is maximized

content.answer: marginal benefit from the cleaner water is equal to the marginal cost of making the water cleaner
